title: How to Draw Flowers and Leaves in a Vase

steps.headline: Draw a line with a black coloured oil pastel.
Draw a small circle at end of the line using the black colour.
Continue drawing small circles around it with any different colour.
Draw another smaller flower with different colours by drawing the same black line.
Draw a semicircle at end of a black colour line.
Draw some small lines from the semicircle using a different colour.

text:
Draw a line with a black coloured oil pastel. Draw a small circle at end of the line using the black colour. Continue drawing small circles around it with any different colour. Draw another smaller flower with different colours by drawing the same black line. Draw a semicircle at end of a black colour line. Draw some small lines from the semicircle using a different colour. Draw some flowers and leaves. Draw a vase.
